inclusion.criterion: Fever and a central venous catheter
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Central line secondary to Hematologic/Oncologic, Renal or Gastrointestinal disease
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Intravenous antibiotics in the 24 hours prior to presentation
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Parental refusal or inability to provide consent
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of ESRD on HD and peritoneal dialysis, with recent C diff infection and antibx use.
